description.name: Men's Rubber Boots, size 40
description.long_desc:
PCV wellington boots are watertight, providing protection against water, moisture, oils, and slip on ceramic tile surfaces (SR). The footwear, with felt lining, ensures insulation from cold surfaces.


These PVC wellington boots are marked according to ISO standards, offering protection against various workplace hazards, including slip resistance, cold insulation, and oil resistance.


Product Marking:
ISO 20347:2021 - compliance with the basic requirements of the standard for occupational footwear.
OB - meets the basic requirements for occupational footwear, including sole resistance to slip on ceramic surfaces covered with a NaLS solution.
CI - sole insulation from cold.
FO - sole resistance to diesel oil.
SR - sole resistance to slip on ceramic surfaces covered with glycerol.


Technical Specifications
































Upper and SolePVC
LiningFelt
Mounting SystemInjection Molding Method
Available Sizes39-47
ColorBlack
Height31 cm
StandardsProduct compliant with ISO 20347:2021

description.name: Ratchet Tie down Strap ERGO 6m/5T/50mm
description.long_desc:
A reliable Geko brand ratchet tie-down strap, perfect for securing loads during transportation. It ensures the highest level of safety and stability thanks to its solid construction and excellent technical parameters.




  • 5-ton Strength: With high load capacity, the Geko ratchet tie-down strap is ideal for securing heavy loads, ensuring their stability and safety.

  • Solid Construction: The strap is made of high-quality polyester, providing durability and resistance to abrasion and mechanical damage.

  • Ergonomic Ratchet: The modern ERGO ratchet allows for quick and trouble-free tensioning of the strap, providing ease of use and effectiveness in any application.

  • 50mm Width: The wide strap evenly distributes pressure, protecting the load from damage and increasing stability during transportation.

  • Intense Orange Color: The highly visible color of the strap facilitates its location and makes it easy to notice in any conditions, further increasing work safety.

  • Resistance: The strap is made of polyester tape resistant to the action of greases, oils, and acids.



Specification:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Strap Length: 6 meters

  • Strength: 5 tons

  • Width: 50 mm

  • Material: Polyester

  • Color: Orange

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage

description.name: Modular platform trolley 150kg
description.long_desc:
The modular platform cart is crafted from high-quality PP (polypropylene), PU (polyurethane), and steel. It is designed for transporting various types of materials weighing up to 150 kg. The platform, measuring 53x73 cm, is made of polypropylene (PP) and its modular design allows several carts to be joined together to form a large platform.


The cart is equipped with 4 durable, bearing-mounted wheels, including two swivel wheels. Made from PP and PU, these wheels are extremely sturdy and, most importantly, do not scratch the surfaces they move on. This cart is ideal for small warehouses and various types of stores.


An additional advantage is the convenient foldable handle, which makes the cart easy to transport and store.


Product Features:



  • Made of high-quality PP, PU, and steel

  • Platform dimensions: 53x73 cm with a maximum load capacity of 150 kg

  • Modular platform design allows several carts to be connected to form a large platform

  • Equipped with four bearing-mounted wheels with a diameter of 100 mm, made of PP and PU

  • Features a convenient foldable handle, allowing easy maneuverability and compact storage

description.short_desc:
The modular platform cart is crafted from high-quality PP (polypropylene), PU (polyurethane), and steel. It is designed for transporting various types of materials weighing up to 150 kg. The platform, measuring 53x73 cm, is made of polypropylene (PP) and its modular design allows several carts to be joined together to form a large platform.


The cart is equipped with 4 durable, bearing-mounted wheels, including two swivel wheels. Made from PP and PU, these wheels are extremely sturdy and, most importantly, do not scratch the surfaces they move on. This cart is ideal for small warehouses and various types of stores.


An additional advantage is the convenient foldable handle, which makes the cart easy to transport and store.

description.name: 7in1 universal foldable multifunctional workbench
description.long_desc:
The multifunctional folding 7-in-1 workbench is an indispensable tool for every DIY enthusiast. Our workbench is a true master of adaptation. With its high functionality, it can be used as a workbench, sawhorse, scaffold, work platform, workshop creeper, platform cart, and even a towing platform. This makes it extremely versatile and easy to adapt to your needs.


The table is made from high-quality materials such as PP, ABS, nylon, TPR, and steel, ensuring its durability and resistance to damage. The dimensions of the worktop/platform are 109x55 cm, providing ample space for work.


Product Features:



  • Work platform made of high-quality polypropylene (PP), reinforced underneath with a steel frame.

  • The workbench features several conveniences that significantly enhance work efficiency, including: 12 holes for securing jaws or woodworking clamps with special adapters, an embossed protractor, and a ruler with both cm and inch markings.

  • The workbench can be quickly and easily transformed into a work platform, scaffold, workshop creeper, platform cart, and towing platform.

  • Equipped with foldable telescopic legs for stability during work.

  • Features 4 wheels, including two swivel wheels.

  • Folding handle with dual purposes: as a handle for the platform cart and as a support for a container for small tools or screws in the work platform configuration.

  • Compact storage when folded.


Workbench Functionality:



  1. Workbench / Worktop

  2. Sawhorses

  3. Workshop Creeper

  4. Scaffold

  5. Work Platform

  6. Platform Cart

  7. Towing Platform


Technical Specifications:


Material: PP, ABS, nylon, TPR, steel


Worktop/Platform Dimensions: 109x55 cm


Load Capacity:


Workbench/Sawhorse: 100 kg


Scaffold/Work Platform: 200 kg


Creeper / Workshop Cart: 100 kg


Towing Platform: 100 kg

description.name: Tungsten carbide cutter 10mmx20mm 6mm
description.long_desc:
Excellent Sharpening Performance: Thanks to the use of tungsten carbide, our cutter exhibits exceptional hardness and wear resistance. This means it can be sharpened multiple times, resulting in long-lasting performance and cost-effectiveness.


Dual Cutting Edges for Precision Machining: Specially designed dual cutting edges provide better stability and precision during metal processing. With this cutter, you can achieve smooth and uniform surfaces with minimal risk of vibration or tool distortion.


Versatile Application: Our cutter is ideal for processing a variety of metals, including steel, aluminum, brass, and other alloys. Regardless of the material, it delivers high efficiency and machining quality.


Optimal Shaft Design: A 6mm diameter shaft ensures stability and precision during operation, minimizing the risk of vibrations and oscillations. As a result, the tool is easy to handle even at high rotational speeds.


Durability and Solidity: Our cutter is made of the highest quality materials, ensuring not only durability but also reliability in any working conditions. Regardless of the intensity of use, you can rely on our product.


Technical Specifications:



  • Cutter Type: Face-end mill

  • Blade Material: Tungsten carbide (Hardmetal)

  • Cutter Diameter: 10mm

  • Overall Length: 20mm

  • Shaft Diameter: 6mm

description.long_desc:
The high-quality hex key set by Geko is an essential tool in any workshop, offering versatility and precision in your work.


Thanks to the ball-end tips, it is possible to operate the keys at an angle of 25 degrees, which facilitates access to hard-to-reach areas. The set includes 9 keys in different colors, making it easy to quickly distinguish between sizes.

description.long_desc:
Front Cutting Pliers – a tool that combines reliability, precision, and user comfort. Ideal for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value high quality and durability in their tools.

  • Hardened CrV Tool Steel: Made from the highest quality hardened CrV tool steel, the pliers ensure long-lasting sharpness and durability, even with intensive use.

  • Material: Chrome-vanadium alloy steel

  • Blade hardness: 58-62 HRC, ensuring high hardness and wear resistance

  • Balance: Perfectly balanced for increased user comfort

  • Shape: Slim, facilitating operation in hard-to-reach areas

  • Handle: Dual-component, contoured, anti-slip, providing a comfortable and secure grip

description.name: Triangular velcro bicycle frame bag
description.long_desc:
The spacious 1-compartment frame bag is the perfect solution for every cyclist!


Product Features:



  • Thoughtful Design: The bag is mounted under the bike frame in the popular "triangle" shape, making its placement completely unobtrusive while riding.

  • High-Quality Construction: Made of durable polyester, resistant to water and easy to clean, it provides protection for the contents against moisture and dirt.

  • Capacity and Functionality: The large zippered compartment can hold essential items such as tools, maps, a phone, and many others, facilitating organization during travel.

  • Easy Installation: Attached with strong Velcro straps, ensuring stability and safety while riding.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Material: Polyester

  • Dimensions: 24 x 18 x 4 cm

  • Color: Black

description.name: Waterproof velcro bicycle frame bag with phone holder
description.long_desc:
Waterproof Bike Frame Bag with Phone Holder is an essential accessory for any cycling enthusiast. Made of durable EVA material and PU leather, it provides protection for your belongings even in harsh weather conditions.


Product Features:



  • Phone Compartment: Special phone compartment allows for easy browsing and use of the phone while riding. The special coating enables touchscreen operation, ensuring convenience and safety.

  • Sunshade Cover: The cover mounted on the top of the bag protects the phone screen from sunlight, improving visibility and usability.

  • Headphone Hole: Special headphone hole allows for listening to music through wired headphones, further enhancing comfort during the ride.

  • Built-in Mesh Pockets: Internal mesh pockets facilitate sorting and storing small items such as keys or wallet.

  • Bike Frame Mount: Mounting with 3 Velcro straps provides convenient and durable mounting on the bike's top frame, ensuring stability even during intense rides.

  • Excellent Waterproofing: The entire bag is made of waterproof material, and the polyester seamless double zippers provide excellent protection against rain and moisture.

  • Capacity: Incredibly spacious main compartment that can hold all the necessary items during a bike trip.

  • Sensitive TPU Touch Screen: Transparent TPU screen housing enables convenient smartphone operation while riding. The phone holder fits most popular models, including iPhone 14, Samsung Galaxy S23, Google Pixel 7 Pro, and other models below 7.2 inches.


Technical Specification:



  • Material: EVA, PU leather

  • Size: 22 x 14 x 11 cm

  • Mounting: on the bike's top frame, 3 Velcro straps mounting

  • Touch Screen Phone Compartment: yes

  • Wired Headphone Hole: yes

  • Waterproof: yes

  • Solid Construction: yes

  • Sunshade Cover: yes

description.name: G-85 aluminum bicycle phone holder
description.long_desc:
Keltin G-85 Aluminum Bike Mount - a reliable companion for every cycling adventure. With innovative solutions and solid construction, this mount not only ensures the safety of your phone but also provides additional comfort during every kilometer.


Product Features:



  • Width Adjustment: A convenient knob enables smooth width adjustment of the mount, allowing for easy fitting for phones of various sizes from 55 to 100mm.

  • Guiding Rails: With guiding rails on both sides, width adjustment becomes even more precise, and the phone is additionally secured against accidental slipping.

  • Sturdy Construction: Made of aluminum, the G-85 mount ensures not only lightness but also durability, keeping your phone safe even during demanding cycling routes.

  • Additional Mounting Rings: The set includes additional rings, enabling the mount to be installed even on a thin bike frame, making it an ideal solution for various bike models.

  • Silicone Mesh: An additional silicone mesh prevents the phone from falling out even on bumpy roads, providing extra protection and stability.

  • Transparent Silicone Strips: Additional transparent silicone strips protect the back of the phone from contact with the aluminum mount.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Keltin

  • Material: Aluminum

  • Phone Width: From 55 to 100mm

  • Accessories: Foam stickers included, additional mounting rings

  • Adjustment: Convenient knob and guiding rails enhancing mount stability

  • Construction: Solid and durable

  • Additional Protections: Silicone mesh preventing phone slippage on bumpy roads, additional transparent silicone strips protecting the back of the phone from scratches

description.name: G-81 aluminum bicycle phone holder
description.long_desc:
Keltin G-81 Aluminum Bike Mount - an indispensable companion for your cycling adventures, providing safety and comfort on every ride.


Product Features:



  • Universal Compatibility: The Keltin G-81 aluminum bike mount fits most phones with a width from 55 to 100mm (up to 6.8" screen), ensuring secure and stable grip during rides.

  • Convenient Adjustment: With a convenient knob for adjusting the mount's width, you can easily customize it to fit your phone, regardless of its size.

  • Phone Protection: The set includes foam stickers that protect the phone's case from scratches and damages, providing an additional layer of protection.

description.name: Rear aluminium bicycle rack with max load 50kg
Set of enforced nickel plating 16in1 bicycle keys
description.long_desc:
A set of reinforced nickel-plated bicycle keys is a versatile tool that allows for easy loosening and tightening of various bike screws. Designed in the form of a convenient pocket knife, the set contains 16 tools, providing comprehensive functionality during bike repairs and maintenance.



  • Sockets: 8, 9, 10 mm

  • Open-end wrenches: 8, 10, 15 mm

  • Spoke wrench: 14GE

  • Hex keys: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6

  • Flat and cross screwdriver

  • Socket adapter

  • Compact size and convenient pocket knife shape


The set is compact and portable, making it easy to fit in a pocket or bike bag, providing tool accessibility anywhere and anytime.


Set equipment



  • Flat and cross screwdriver: Both types of screwdrivers allow for the handling of various screws and mounting elements on the bike, from brake adjustments to the installation of racks or fenders.

  • Socket adapter: The adapter enables the use of different sockets, increasing the set's functionality and allowing for the handling of more specialized bike parts.

  • Open-end wrenches 8, 10, 15mm: Open-end wrenches enable easy tightening and loosening of nuts and screws of various sizes, essential during bike maintenance and repairs.

  • Hex keys 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6: Hex keys are essential tools for handling screws and nuts with internal hexagonal heads, such as those found on the handlebars, saddle, or bike pedals.

  • Sockets 8, 9, 10mm: Sockets allow for the handling of specialized bike components, such as wheel axles or bottom brackets, providing comprehensive functionality to the set.


Examples of Use



  • Bike repair and maintenance: With the variety of tools, the set enables precise adjustment and servicing of every bike part, from the handlebars to the wheel axle.

  • Emergency repairs on the trail: The compact size of the set allows for easy carrying during bike trips, ensuring readiness for quick interventions in case of breakdowns.

  • Installation and removal of additional components: Open-end wrenches, hex keys, and other tools enable quick installation or removal of additional accessories, such as racks, baskets, or lighting.

  • Open-end wrenches 8, 10, 15mm: Open-end wrenches enable easy tightening and loosening of nuts and screws of various sizes, essential during bike maintenance and repairs.

  • Hex keys 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6: Hex keys are essential tools for handling screws and nuts with internal hexagonal heads, such as those found on the handlebars, saddle, or bike pedals.

  • Sockets 8, 9, 10mm: Sockets allow for the handling of specialized bike components, such as wheel axles or bottom brackets, providing comprehensive functionality to the set.


Examples of Use



  • Bike repair and maintenance: With the variety of tools, the set enables precise adjustment and servicing of every bike part, from the handlebars to the wheel axle.

  • Emergency repairs on the trail: The compact size of the set allows for easy carrying during bike trips, ensuring readiness for quick interventions in case of breakdowns.

  • Installation and removal of additional components: Open-end wrenches, hex keys, and other tools enable quick installation or removal of additional accessories, such as racks, baskets, or lighting.

description.name: Foldable wall hanger for a bicycle 36x30x48cm
description.long_desc:
A foldable bike rack is an excellent solution for every two-wheel enthusiast.


Here's why it's worth choosing:



  • Horizontal suspension: This rack allows for hanging the bike horizontally, which is convenient and saves space.

  • Distance between supports: The rack has a distance between supports of 46 cm, allowing for stable and secure bike storage.

  • Soft foam on supports: The supports are covered with soft foam, protecting the bike frame from accidental scratches.

  • Durability and strength: Made of durable material, ensuring long-lasting use.

  • Compact design: When folded, the rack takes up very little space and protrudes from the wall only 15 cm. It's the perfect solution if you have limited space.

  • Easy installation: The set includes 4 mounting plugs.


Technical specifications:


Material: steel, soft foam


Mounting method: wall-mounted - foldable


Bike attachment method: via the frame


Distance between supports: 46cm


Length of supports: 46 cm


Additional information: mounting plugs included

description.name: Wall hanger for a bicycle
description.long_desc:
The wall-mounted bike rack is a solution that allows you to cleverly store your bike, saving space in the garage, basement, or workshop. The construction of this rack successfully enables hanging various tools such as garden tools, workshop tools, trimmers, garden hoses, etc.


Here's why our rack will meet your expectations:



  • Secure storage: The rack allows storing the bike horizontally as close to the wall as possible. The rack's hooks are covered with rubber to protect the bike frame from accidental scratches.

  • Durability and strength: Made of durable material, ensuring long-lasting use.

  • Easy installation: The set includes 4 mounting plugs. Two plugs for plasterboard (GK) and two expansion plugs.

  • Universal application: The rack is compatible with various types of bikes, suitable for city, mountain, and road bikes.


Technical specifications:


Material: steel, rubber


Mounting method: wall-mounted


Bike attachment method: via the frame


Additional information: mounting plugs included

description.name: Bicycle saddle bag
description.long_desc:
The saddlebag is an indispensable companion for every cyclist who values comfort and practicality.


Here's why our saddlebag will meet your expectations:



  • Waterproof: Regardless of the weather conditions, your belongings will remain dry. Our saddlebag is made of waterproof material, so you don't have to worry about rain or mud.

  • Durability: The saddlebag is crafted from durable 600D Oxford material, which is resistant to abrasions and damage. This means it will serve you for many years.

  • Optimal size: The saddlebag measures 21x9x9.5 cm, making it spacious enough to hold essential items. You can easily fit small tools, a spare tube, keys, phone, or wallet.

  • Easy installation: The saddlebag is mounted under the saddle using straps or Velcro. It's a simple and quick solution that doesn't require specialized tools.


Technical specifications:


Material: 600D Oxford


Waterproof: Yes


Mounting method: Under the saddle


Dimensions: 21x9x9.5 cm


Weight: 122g
